index.dscr: Questo strumento basato su javascript permette di visuallizare i simboli ufficiali WBSC per aiutare nuovi scorers/scorekeepers. Usa gli elementi dell'interfaccia per creare situazioni di baseball/softball, poi premi sul pulsante 'Classifica azione' per vedere come dovrebbe essere scritta. Se vuoi salvare il risultato, premi il pulsante 'Scarica imagine'. Se qualcosa è sbagliato, segnalalo .
index.license: Questo software è distribuito sotto UNLICENSE. Ciò significa che lo strumento e i suoi output sono assolutamente gratuiti da utilizzare per chiunque e per qualsiasi scopo. Non è necessario chiedere alcun permesso, né accreditare l'autore. Tuttavia, se desideri farlo, sarà apprezzato :)
index.endorse: Inoltre, se ti piace questo strumento, parlane per aiutare altri eventuali utenti.

strikeOut.title: Strike out
strikeOut.KSB: Swinging - bunt in foul sul terzo strike

sacrifice.title: Sacrificio
sacrifice.SHET: Bunt di sacrificio con errore di tiro
sacrifice.SHEF: Bunt di sacrificio con errore di presa al volo

obr.title: Out per regola
obr.OBR_rol: Correva fuori dalla linea delle basi

sb.title: Steal / CS
sb.CSN: Caught stealing with fielding error (no advance)
sb.CSNT: Caught stealing with throwing error (no advance)
sb.POEN: Pick off attempt with (throwing) error (no advance)
sb.POCSE: Pick off attempt + CS with (throwing) error
sb.POCSEN: Pick off attempt + CS with (throwing) error (no advance)

validation.noEmptyInput: At least one input group must be selected.
validation.minPositions: At least %pos% involved positions must be selected for current action.
validation.noNAAdvance: 'No advance' action may not result into further advance.
validation.noSBAdvance: 'Stolen base' may not result into further advance.
validation.noE2TSB: Catcher may not be credited with an error when trying to catch runner stealing, unless there is further advance due to it.
validation.noSelfAsist: A fielder cannot assist directly to self.
validation.noMultipleAsist: A fielder cannot have more than 1 assist in a play.
validation.runnerOnlyAction: Runners-only action (SB/CS/PO/BK/IP) cannot be combined with batter's action.
validation.max3Outs: There cannot be more than 3 outs in one play.
validation.3OutsNoRuns: There cannot be 3 outs and a run scored in one play.
validation.noOutAfterOut: One player cannot be out more than once.
validation.noAdvanceAfterOut: Player cannot advance further after being out.
validation.advanceInOrder: Extra advances of one runner must happen in order.
validation.noSameBase: Two runners cannot finish on the same base.
validation.noHitAndO: It is not possible to score a HIT, if a runner is forced out before reaching next base, use 'FC - Occupied' instead.
validation.noHitAndA: It is not possible to score a HIT, if there is an appeal play with forced out, use 'FC - Occupied' instead.
validation.noADVWithoutBatter: 'Advanced by batter' is not possible without batter's action.
validation.invalidADV: 'Advanced by batter' can only be the FIRST runner action.
validation.notFO2: Force out at 2nd is not possible, because the runner from 1st is not forced to advance.
validation.notFO3: Force out at 3rd is not possible, because the runner from 2nd is not forced to advance.
validation.notFOH: Force out at Home is not possible, because the runner from 3rd is not forced to advance.
validation.noDistantFO: Force out is only possible at the closest base to advance on.
validation.missingOPlay: FC - occupied is selected, but corresponding out/decisive error is missing.
validation.invalidOPlay: Player who decides throwing to a different runner during 'FC - occupied' must be the same in corresponding play.
validation.missingFCPlay: FC is selected, but corresponding runner advance is missing.
validation.missingPBPlay: If strikeout with FC is selected, there must be a passed ball credited to a runner.
validation.missingGDPPlay: GDP is selected, but corresponding out/decisive error is missing.
validation.missingGDPOPlay: GDP - occupied is selected, but corresponding out/decisive error plays are missing.
validation.missingSHPlay: SH is selected, but no runner advanced by batter.
validation.missingSFPlay: SF is selected, but no runner advanced by batter.
validation.missingSFRun: SF is selected, but no runner scored.
validation.noSBCS: SB is not possible, when another runner was CS, use 'FC - indifference'.
validation.noMixedExtraAdvances: WP/PB/BK/IP cannot be combined. Use only one action type in all inputs.
validation.noWPAfterPlay: WP cannot happen after another play (except for SB and BB).
validation.noPBAfterPlay: PB cannot happen after another play (except for SB and BB).
validation.noPlayAfterIP: IP must be the only runner play at the moment.
validation.noPlayAfterBK: BK must be the only runner play at the moment.
validation.noPlayAfterRLE: RLE must be the only runner play at the moment.
validation.noHBBWithoutHit: HBB must be scored together with a single for the batter.
validation.noPlayAfterDeadBall: Selected action is a dead-ball and prevents all runner actions except forced advancements.
validation.noAdvanceOnNA: No further advance is possible after 'no advance' play.
validation.noSE:
Advance by 'Same error (#p#)' is selected, 
but no corresponding error play was given.
validation.noExAdvFC:
Further advance after 'FC - Occupied' may happen only once,
 adjust target base instead.
validation.noExAdvSE:
Further advance on 'Same error (#p#)' may happen only once,
 adjust target base instead.
validation.noER:
Earned run is selected (#p#), 
but this is not possible with a decisive error.
validation.noTieER: If a run is scored with a runner placed as TIE, it must be an unearned run.
validation.missingOAdv:
Advance after 'FC - Occupied' is selected, 
but no corresponding FC play was given.
